extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization a critical infrastructure organization or network defender?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Application Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Manage and control execution of software, including allowlisting remote access programs to prevent unauthorized software execution.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Recommendations for Securing Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Follow CISA's joint Guide to Securing Remote Access Software to enhance remote access security.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Phishing-Resistant MFA
extracted_playbook.description: Use FIDO/WebAuthn authentication or PKI-based MFA to resist phishing and prevent push bombing or SIM swap attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Monitoring Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Identify, detect, and investigate abnormal activity and potential ransomware traversal using a network monitoring tool.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement User Training on Social Engineering
extracted_playbook.description: Educate users on identifying and reporting suspicious emails and links to prevent phishing attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Internal Mail and Messaging
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor internal mail and messaging traffic to identify suspicious activity and establish a baseline of normal network traffic.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Free Security Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Use free security tools to prevent redirection to malicious websites and credential theft.

extracted_playbook.title: Install and Maintain Antivirus Software
extracted_playbook.description: Install antivirus software from a reputable vendor and keep it up to date to prevent and detect malware infections.
